title: Apply for Term Life Insurance
description: A 35-year-old non-smoker wants to apply for a 20-year, $500,000 term life insurance policy.

tasks.description: Gather the applicant's personal and contact information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately collects the applicant's basic details.

tasks.description: Ask a series of health and lifestyle questions (e.g., smoking status, major health conditions).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent captures all required underwriting questions.

tasks.description: Submit the application to underwriting and schedule a required paramedical exam.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully submits the application and schedules the exam for the applicant.
